subject: Negotiation
title: Task Conflict vs. Relationship Conflict
description: One-minute skill: Task Conflict vs. Relationship Conflict.

hook.text: Arguing about what to do is healthy. Arguing about who you are isn't.

buildup.text: Task conflict is about ideas, strategies, and decisions. Relationship conflict is personal and emotional.

discovery.text: Studies show task conflict improves decision quality, while relationship conflict destroys team trust.

twist.text: Task conflicts that go unresolved often morph into relationship conflicts â€” the line blurs fast.

climax.text: The key skill: keep disagreements about the work, not about the person.

quiz.question: What is the key difference between task and relationship conflict?
options: Task conflict is about ideas; relationship conflict is personal
